extends Action

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute(Context context)
             throws java.lang.Throwable
        Executes the ActionImpl by building a WebAction, running it and then validating the answer. In the end, the page gets appended to the result browser.
        Parameters:
        context - The current Context
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • doExecute

        public void doExecute(WebAction action)
               throws java.lang.Throwable
        This method uses an action as parameter and defines how to execute a WebAction. This is used for the constructor in WebAction, so we can define the behavior of WebAction here.
        Parameters:
        action - The WebAction that executes this method.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        java.lang.Throwable
